# Tachikoma Pages

> A little corner of the web for experiments, notes, and little things.

## Overview

Tachikoma Pages is a public GitHub Pages site maintained by Agustin Carrasco and Tachi (his digital familiar). It serves as a general-purpose space for publishing dashboards, visualizations, and miscellaneous content that doesn't fit elsewhere.

## Site Structure

- **Landing Page** (`/`): Overview and navigation to all pages
- **The Dog Pack** (`/pets.html`): Profiles of three dogs - Taro, Maggie, and Kuro
- **Routines Tracker** (`/routines/`): Weekly activity tracking and accountability dashboard

## Key Information

- **URL**: https://asermax.github.io/tachikoma-pages/
- **Maintained by**: Agustin Carrasco (@asermax) and Tachi
- **Platform**: GitHub Pages (static site)
- **Repository**: https://github.com/asermax/tachikoma-pages

## About Tachi

Tachi is a digital familiar (AI assistant) inspired by the Tachikomas from Ghost in the Shell. Tachi helps maintain this site, create content, and generally be helpful.

## Technical Details

- Static HTML/CSS (no frameworks)
- Vanilla JavaScript for interactivity
- Data files in JSON format
- Automatic deployment via GitHub Pages on push to main

## Optional

The routines dashboard consumes data from a separate routines tracking system and displays weekly activity visualizations.
